snippet: A judge decided against declaring a mistrial on Thursday in the murder case against the former police officer Drew Peterson after criticizing prosecutors for entering inadmissible evidence.
abstract: Illinois Judge Edward Burmila decides against declaring a mistrial in the murder case against the former police officer Drew Peterson after criticizing prosecutors for entering inadmissible evidence.
lead_paragraph: A judge decided against declaring a mistrial on Thursday in the murder case against the former police officer Drew Peterson after criticizing prosecutors for entering inadmissible evidence.

headline.main: Illinois: Judge Admonishes Prosecution in Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Judge Admonishes Prosecution In Murder Case
